Jupyter Notebooks
******************

The notebooks provided here are tutorials on how to use various aspects of the
data tools, although by no means do they cover the full depth of capabilities.
The interactive notebooks are included in the install; see 
:ref:`notebook_launch`.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1

   PhaiiData.ipynb
   TteData.ipynb
   Responses.ipynb
   PositionHistory.ipynb
   Trigdat.ipynb
   Skymaps.ipynb
   DataFinders.ipynb
   PhaExport.ipynb
   SpectralFitting.ipynb
   ScatFiles.ipynb
   Simulations.ipynb
   DataPrimitives.ipynb
   Plugins.ipynb
   Visualizations.ipynb
